trans-unit.target: Change your login credentials and choose your language.

To use an existing account for login, add one of your social media accounts. Add a recovery email in case you forget your login details for Transport Talent. All changes must be confirmed with your current password.
Add a login via social media or deactivate existing accounts.
Enter a rescue email to be able to restore your login credentials.

Transport Talent allows you to keep in mind interesting companies from transport and logistics. Add companies to your overview or delete them as you see fit.
Manage your job hunt with Transport Talent – add and delete jobs as you see fit. Postings will still be available after deactivation by the employer to allow you to prepare for interviews.
Here you find all referrals you have ever made. Remember, once a job has been filled with a candidate that you put forward, you will get rewarded with the amount you find next to the recommended job.
Help your network to get a job and earn money.
Want to be notified about new job postings? Set up one or more job alerts with your own criteria and we will send you an email when there are new positions available.
Please note: all fields signed with a (*) are mandatory.
